actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing opposition to proposed curtailment of benefits under medicare.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President's proposal to restructure the medicare deductible for physician services and the copayment for inpatient hospital services to require citizens to pay more of the health bill shall not be enacted.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing opposition to proposed curtailment of benefits under medicare.
